history.proof: intros. unfold Reflexive in *. intros H'. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros A B HR1_refl HR2_refl x.
intros A' B HR1_refl HR2_refl x.
intros A' B' HR1_refl HR2_refl x.

original: intros A B HR1_refl HR2_refl x. unfold Reflexive in *. intros H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. split. - apply HR1_refl. - apply HR2_refl.
